ticks.description: The amount of ticks that the cooldown should be active for.
ticks.markdownDescription: The amount of ticks that the cooldown should be active for.

type.description:
[Item Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_action_types/cooldown)

Sets the cooldown of the stack's associated item.

Type ID: `apugli:cooldown`
